nodes.text: OT-17 Eliminator Droid was the designation of a battle droid located on Balmorra around 3642 BBY, when it was destroyed.

The OT-17 Eliminator Droid appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Balmorra. It is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means it was destroyed.
